description: More markets for the Bundesliga game, scheduled for March 7 at 9:30 AM ET.

markets.description:
In the upcoming Bundesliga game, scheduled for March 7 at 9:30 AM ET:

This market will resolve to "1. FC Heidenheim 1846" if 1. FC Heidenheim 1846 win the game by 2 or more goals.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "TSG 1899 Hoffenheim".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50–50.

This market will resolve according to the official final score published on bundesliga.com. This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

The primary resolution source for this market is the official statistics of the event as recognized by the governing body or event organizers. However, if the governing body or event organizers have not published final match statistics within 2 hours after the event's conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead.

markets.description:
In the upcoming Bundesliga game between 1. FC Heidenheim 1846 and TSG 1899 Hoffenheim, scheduled for March 7 at 9:30 AM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if 1. FC Heidenheim 1846 and TSG 1899 Hoffenheim combine to score 2 or more goals in this game.

If the combined total is less than 2, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50–50.

If the game is started but not completed, this market will resolve according to the official final score published on bundesliga.com. This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

The primary resolution source for this market is the official statistics of the event as recognized by the governing body or event organizers. However, if the governing body or event organizers have not published final match statistics within 2 hours after the event's conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead.

markets.description:
In the upcoming Bundesliga game between 1. FC Heidenheim 1846 and TSG 1899 Hoffenheim, scheduled for March 7 at 9:30 AM ET:

This market will resolve to "Yes" if both 1. FC Heidenheim 1846 and TSG 1899 Hoffenheim each score at least one goal during the game.

This market will resolve to "No" if either team fails to score (i.e., if one or both teams finish with zero goals).

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50–50.

If the game is started but not completed, this market will resolve according to the official final score published on bundesliga.com. This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

The primary resolution source for this market is the official statistics of the event as recognized by the governing body or event organizers.
